## Container.registerTransformer() method

Registers a transformer with the container for the specified key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerTransformer<K extends Key, T = K>(key: K, transformer: Transformer<T>): boolean;
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

key


</td><td>

K


</td><td>

The key to resolved to register the transformer with.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

transformer


</td><td>

[Transformer](../fast-element.transformer_2/)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

The transformer to register.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean
